issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
We identified an issue in our project with iOS, when we minimize and maximize (2-4 times) app is crashing even in a simulator.  Crash report pointing to main.m line number - 66.

Then we tried with creating a sample project and run with 7.5.1. Repeated same steps it worked well. When we changed to 8.0 and 8.0.1 it was crashing.

I am not providing any sample here because creating fresh new alloy app itself crashing.

Thank you.
fields.summary: Continues minimize and maximize app is crashing with Ti SDK 8.0 & 8.0.1

comments.body: See TIMOB-27049 for details and a fix.
[~nagaharish] Can you try the PR in ticket mentioned by [~hknoechel]? Thanks!

@Vijay thank you we are working with 7.5.+ for now and release this version. It was delayed because of WKWEBVIEW changes. I am happy to close this issue if we already have another ticket (TIMOB-27049).
Closing this issue as fixed via TIMOB-27049
